title: Extinction (War of the Spider Queen #4)

Storyline:

Extinction (Forgotten Realms: R.A. Salvatore's War of the Spider, Book 4)

This contains the last three titles from R.A. Salvatoreâ€™s War of the Spider Queen six-book series: Extinction, Annihilation, and Resurrection. All three titles hit the New York Times best-seller list upon hardcover release. Each author is a veteran writer who is well-known to Forgotten Realms fans, and multiple-time best-selling author R.A. Salvatore consulted on the entire series of titles.

Dissolution (Forgotten Realms: R.A. Salvatore's War of the Spider Queen, Book 1)

Insurrection (Forgotten Realms: R.A. Salvatore's War of the Spider Queen, Book 2)

Condemnation (Forgotten Realms: R.A. Salvatore's War of the Spider Queen, Book 3)

Extinction (Forgotten Realms: R.A. Salvatore's War of the Spider, Book 4)

Annihilation: War of the Spider Queen, Book V (R.A Salvatore Presents the War of the Spider Queen)

Resurrection (Forgotten Realms: R.A. Salvatore's War of the Spider Queen, Book 6)
author: Lisa Smedman
